title.native: カードファイト!! ヴァンガードG ギアースクライシス編

description:
A major event known as "G Quest" is to be organized by the Federation of International Vanguard Associations (FIVA) this autumn. Those who conquer six Branch Quests will be honored the title "Generation Master" as well as the chance to become a Clan Leader. While members of TRY3 are all excited by new goals ahead, a massive conspiracy that would lead to the destruction of Vanguard has been secretly set in motion.

(Source: Anime News Network)

node.description: Akira Ito (伊藤 彰, Itō Akira) is a manga artist. Ito drew Yu-Gi-Oh! R while the creator of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise, Kazuki Takahashi, came up with the storyline. Ito's drawing style is similar to Takahashi's. Ito later co-created Cardfight!! Vanguard in collaboration with Satoshi Nakamura (technical advisor for Duel Masters) and Bushiroad president Takaaki Kidani, he is also the author of Cardfight!! Vanguard manga and Cardfight!! Vanguard G: THE PROLOGUE, as well as the illustrator/designer of several cards in the Cardfight!! Vanguard game.

Consists of [DAIGO](https://anilist.co/staff/110119) (Vocalist, lyricist, composer), AKIHIDE (Guitarist, chorus, synthesizer, lyricist, composer, arrangement), and SHINPEI (same as AKIHIDE). There are many tied-up to their songs.

Ever since their 5th single, Everlasting Luv, they got involved into singing Detective Conan, and 10th single, CLIMBER×CLIMBER, they got involved into acting in and singing for Vanguard CMs!!
Vocalist DAIGO is popular for his grandfather being the ex-politician Noboru Takeshita. There are also some family members that are famous, including [Eiki Eiki](https://anilist.co/staff/97236), who is his older sister. He voiced in 13th Detective Conan Movie as well.

Affiliated with Mouse.

He is described by his colleagues as someone very efficient with his line work, particularly the speed at which he can make corrections.
